entry.title: Family Photos
entry.summary:
Author: bandhoez9194

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,843Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 62

Summary: "You- you want me in your family photo for the calender?" He demanded breathlessly, Eddie blinking at him blankly. "Duh?" He said and Buck laughed a bit incredulously. "Duh? That's all you have to say? Eddie, that's- that's more than just our little group thinking we're- odd. That's telling all of LA you think I'm your family," he said and Eddie nodded confused. "Buck youre on all my paperwork. All of Christopher's paperwork. You're in my will. Half your shit is in my house. You have your own drawer in my dresser and a toothbrush in my bathroom. I'm pretty sure the school thinks we're married. Its- bigger than the 118 bud," he said and Buck just stared. ~~~~~~~~~ The Diaz family gets chosen for the family themed Firefighter calender. Eddie doesnt hesitate to ask Buck to join them.

entry.title: Truth or dare
entry.summary:
Author: David3096

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,755Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: "It's your turn for revenge, dare.""Take off your shirt." His mouth reacts long before his mind does. He wanted to think of something truly embarrassing, something to make him feel the same discomfort he just felt. But apparently his horny side took over."Haven't you seen enough shirtless Latino men already?" Eddie gives him a smile that can only be described as flirtatious. Buck blushes and is about to protest, but his friend obeys. His skin is exposed, the hair on his chest much more abundant than his clothes had revealed. His neck, his arms, his abdomen... Eddie adjusts his hair and exposes his armpits. His hairy armpits. His brain short-circuits and he can't stop staring. He suspects Eddie did it on purpose. "Happy now?""It's Valentine's Day, there's a rule that you have to see a handsome man's naked torso." Eddie's face lights up. "But since no handsome man invited me today, I'll have to settle with you." Eddie laughs but throws his shirt in his face. He quickly smells it before throwing it on the loveseat. Its scent is intoxicating; he wishes he could smell his skin directly.Or, Buck and Eddie spend Valentine's Day playing video games and truth or dare.

entry.title: Better The Devil You Know, Than The Devil You Don't...
entry.summary:
Author: InterrogateTheCat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,312Chapters: 14/50Kudos: 482

Summary: Lucifer made a deal with the Buckley's, he will save Daniel and they take in and love his son Evan as their own. When the Buckley parents don't follow through with their side of the deal, Lucifer brings Evan with him to LA. This is the story of Evan Buckley the Son of the Devil, The Prince of Hell. Note:First 2 Chapters go through his life before the 118.Chapter 3 he is with the 118.Chapter 4 is when Eddie arrives. entry.title: Napkins
entry.summary:
Author: PhenomenalWoman

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,715Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 49

Summary: Buck and Eddie meet at a bar before Eddie's first shift at the 118. It will change everything and absolutely nothing. ~ ‚ÄúFuck,‚Äù Buck pushes his empty water cup away. ‚ÄúFuck, I am so stupid.‚Äù He drops his forehead to the bar, which is a definite red flag to the bartender who has already been eyeing him suspiciously. ‚ÄúI told her I‚Äôd water her plants. She left me her keys. Fuck.‚Äù ‚ÄúYou were gonna water her plants while she slept with other guys?‚Äù Eddie‚Äôs voice is incredulous. Buck imagines his face is equally incredulous, probably pitying and no doubt in disbelief that someone could be so goddamn dumb. And somehow, Buck can‚Äôt help but laugh. His face stretches into what is probably the first smile since he found out Abby was leaving. ‚ÄúShe has a lot of them,‚Äù Buck defends, finally picking his head back up. Eddie is smiling too, wide and bright. His canine teeth, a stark and sharp contrast from the rest of his teeth, flash in the low bar lights.
